messages.content: This is disgusting.... please make more.
MeToo is about sharing personal stories of sexual assault. Reframing it as accusation based, and as furthering a kidnap, is fucking disgusting.
The thought of shooting anything at asylum seekers is appalling.
Disgusting of you [NAME] you filthy who're you pedophilic scum trying to beguile our children it's not gonna work I got [NAME] castorated
This is one of the worst I've seen...
Sign my name to it too lol it was so awful we deserve pain and suffering for that!
This is gonna get worse before it gets better.
We’re used to crazy cold weather but this is much worse, a lot of people are just staying inside till Thursday.
I mean everyone already knows what u like so its gonna be weird

The worst thing is when you find it in a place you know you looked first.

That specific block is probably one of the worst in the city.
I do this but but feel better in the end because I use it for procrastination. It's a weird combinational to feel better and worse while cleaning.
